A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The worst Star Wars movie ever made... and that's saying something because Clone Wars was terrible.  Say what you will about the Force Awakens\, at least the plot made sense.  Rian Johnson absolutely ruined the franchise with this movie.  The writing and dialogue were awful\, the movie was paced like a shitty carnival ride\, the humor wasn't funny and very poorly placed\, they took a dump all over Luke's legacy\, and there's so many plot holes it's laughable.... I will not be seeing another Star Wars movie in theaters\, it's the only way I know how to tell Disney what they've allowed to happen to this franchise is completely unacceptable.
